hello.text: I think I have a problem, sister. Usually I can read minds pretty well...{n}Well, except from yours. But lately this has proven to be harder and harder.

how.name: How are you feeling ?
how.text: Sleepy. Actually, I have felt drained out for ages now.

what.name: Did you do anything out of the usual ?
what.text: Well, I have been playing with Rin quite a lot yesterday.

what.name: Ask her if she sneezes in the presence of Rin.
what.text: Yes, but you do it all the time as well.{n}Isn't this normal ?

cheer.name: Cheer her up by agitating your arms
cheer.narrator: {i}It always manages to lighten up her mood.{n}She is less tense already{s}

cat.name: Call rin to play
cat.narrator: {i}She meows and curls on Satori.{n}It would be very cute, if not for a now unconscious Satori...{s}

check.name: Check her eye
check.narrator: {i}You notice her third eye is bloated, and abnormally red.{s}

mindread.name: Try to read her subconscious
mindread.narrator: {i}You feel a burning eye. You see sea of flammes.{s}

analyze.name: Analyze her eye closely
analyze.narrator: {i}You notice fur stuck on her eyelid.{n}Her retina also seem to have suffer some damage{s}

silly.name: Attach wings to the third eye
silly.narrator: {i}The third eye now became an evil eye.{n}It cries bloody tears.{n}This is painful but it gets less bloated in the end.{s}

operate.name: Operate her eye
operate.narrator: {i}You put Satori to sleep with some flower gaz and make an incision in her eye using one of your rose's thorns.{n}After only a few minutes, you manage to extract fur from inside the eye.{n}Looks like is still pretty damaged though{s}

punch.name: Kick the eye
punch.text: Sister, I'm pretty sure this won't help.{n}I really wonder what you're thinking some times.

prosthesis.name: Try to find something to patch her up
prosthesis.narrator: {i}Looking into your trinkets, you find an adaptative Kappa lense.{n}The lucky find should help with Satori's sight.
